<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

  case 'saas':

  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

data.html:
SaaS sales tax laws are complex and constantly changing

A growing number of jurisdictions are taxing software sales — just last year, Vermont and Louisiana joined the list. Keeping up with global tax changes? Nearly impossible.

Numeral’s end-to-end compliance platform keeps software companies compliant while automating tedious tax tasks. By connecting your billing systems (e.g., Stripe), Numeral tracks nexus thresholds and identifies potential exposure, acting as a bridge between your business and sales tax compliance.

How it works

When we say end-to-end, we mean it.

Numeral integrates with your billing systems to track physical and economic nexus across 13,000 jurisdictions. Once nexus is established, we automatically register, file, and remit on your behalf.

Our API and tax engine calculate real-time tax rates with precision, while our virtual mailbox collects and processes state paperwork.

With built-in compliance monitoring, alerts, and reporting, you’ll always stay ahead of tax obligations. And with the Numeral Guarantee, your sales tax is filed on time—if not, we cover any penalties and interest.

Flexible and scalable

Numeral offers native integrations and the flexibility of an API to fit your business needs.

Our one-click integrations make setup effortless — just a single click and you're connected. For more advanced use cases, our API delivers real-time tax calculations, integrating with your existing workflows for both customers and finance teams.

One platform to support global growth and compliance.

SaaS sales tax laws are complex and constantly changing

A growing number of jurisdictions are taxing software sales — just last year, Vermont and Louisiana joined the list. Keeping up with global tax changes? Nearly impossible.

Numeral’s end-to-end compliance platform keeps software companies compliant while automating tedious tax tasks. By connecting your billing systems (e.g., Stripe), Numeral tracks nexus thresholds and identifies potential exposure, acting as a bridge between your business and sales tax compliance.

How it works

When we say end-to-end, we mean it.

Numeral integrates with your billing systems to track physical and economic nexus across 13,000 jurisdictions. Once nexus is established, we automatically register, file, and remit on your behalf.

Our API and tax engine calculate real-time tax rates with precision, while our virtual mailbox collects and processes state paperwork.

With built-in compliance monitoring, alerts, and reporting, you’ll always stay ahead of tax obligations. And with the Numeral Guarantee, your sales tax is filed on time—if not, we cover any penalties and interest.

Flexible and scalable

Our one-click integrations make setup effortless — just a single click and you're connected. For more advanced use cases, our API delivers real-time tax calculations, integrating with your existing workflows for both customers and finance teams.

data.html:
<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':

  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';

  break;
  case 'saas':

    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

data.html:
SaaS sales tax laws are complex and constantly changing

A growing number of jurisdictions are taxing software sales — just last year, Vermont and Louisiana joined the list. Keeping up with global tax changes? Nearly impossible.

Numeral’s end-to-end compliance platform keeps software companies compliant while automating tedious tax tasks. By connecting your billing systems (e.g., Stripe), Numeral tracks nexus thresholds and identifies potential exposure, acting as a bridge between your business and sales tax compliance.

How it works

When we say end-to-end, we mean it.

Numeral integrates with your billing systems to track physical and economic nexus across 13,000 jurisdictions. Once nexus is established, we automatically register, file, and remit on your behalf.

Our API and tax engine calculate real-time tax rates with precision, while our virtual mailbox collects and processes state paperwork.

With built-in compliance monitoring, alerts, and reporting, you’ll always stay ahead of tax obligations. And with the Numeral Guarantee, your sales tax is filed on time—if not, we cover any penalties and interest.

Flexible and scalable

Numeral offers native integrations and the flexibility of an API to fit your business needs.

Our one-click integrations make setup effortless — just a single click and you're connected. For more advanced use cases, our API delivers real-time tax calculations, integrating with your existing workflows for both customers and finance teams.

SaaS sales tax laws are complex and constantly changing

A growing number of jurisdictions are taxing software sales — just last year, Vermont and Louisiana joined the list. Keeping up with global tax changes? Nearly impossible.

Numeral’s end-to-end compliance platform keeps software companies compliant while automating tedious tax tasks. By connecting your billing systems (e.g., Stripe), Numeral tracks nexus thresholds and identifies potential exposure, acting as a bridge between your business and sales tax compliance.

How it works

When we say end-to-end, we mean it.

Numeral integrates with your billing systems to track physical and economic nexus across 13,000 jurisdictions. Once nexus is established, we automatically register, file, and remit on your behalf.

Our API and tax engine calculate real-time tax rates with precision, while our virtual mailbox collects and processes state paperwork.

With built-in compliance monitoring, alerts, and reporting, you’ll always stay ahead of tax obligations. And with the Numeral Guarantee, your sales tax is filed on time—if not, we cover any penalties and interest.

Flexible and scalable

Numeral offers native integrations and the flexibility of an API to fit your business needs.

Our one-click integrations make setup effortless — just a single click and you're connected. For more advanced use cases, our API delivers real-time tax calculations, integrating with your existing workflows for both customers and finance teams.

<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
